{{food.name}} ❤
{{food.origins}}
{{tag}}
Time to cook about {{food.cookTime}}
{{food.price | currency}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { ServiceFoodService } from 'src/app/service.food.service'; import { Food } from 'src/app/shared/models/food'; @Component({ selector: 'app-food-page', templateUrl: './food-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./food-page.component.scss'] }) export class FoodPageComponent { food!: Food; constructor(activatedRoute:ActivatedRoute, foodService: ServiceFoodService){ activatedRoute.params.subscribe((params)=> { if(params.id) this.food = foodService.getFoodById(params.id); }) } }
